UCREL Semantic Analysis System (USAS) =====================================
**What it does** Annotates English text with detailed semantic categories, using a set of over `200 semantic labels <http://ucrel.lancs.ac.uk/usas/semtags.txt>`_ .
**Required annotations**
* None
**Generated Annotations**
* A LIF document with a new view containing `SemanticRole <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/SemanticRole.html>`_ annotations
